item.title: 欧盟加强与南非的关系，该国正面临特朗普的怒火
item.description: 欧盟最高外交官表示，欧盟和南非正在建立更紧密的关系，此前的分歧导致双方关系冷淡。【原文：The European Union and South Africa are forging closer ties after previous disagreements led to a frosty relationship, the bloc’s top diplomat said.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克股价下跌面临新激进主义运动的风险
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）在欧洲大型医药股中长期表现不佳。一些市场人士表示，随着关键药物专利即将到期，疫苗销售量下降，葛兰素史克可能会再次吸引激进投资者。【原文：GSK Plc is a long-term underperformer among Europe’s Big Pharma stocks. And with key drug patents set to expire and vaccine sales falling, some market participants say it may draw in activist investors again.】

item.title: 报道称日本集团可能寻求特斯拉交易，日产汽车股价大涨
item.description: 英国《金融时报》报道称，日本一个高层集团已为埃隆-马斯克的特斯拉公司制定了投资这家陷入困境的汽车制造商的计划，日产汽车公司股价随即大涨。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. shares jumped after the Financial Times reported that a high-level Japanese group has drawn up plans for Elon Musk’s Tesla Inc. to invest in the struggling carmaker.】

item.title: 德国政治必须在联盟数学上动真格
item.description:
选举可能只差几个零点几个百分点就会陷入混乱。【原文：

The election could be a few fractions of percentage points from incoherence.

】

item.title: 2月份印度经济活动有所扩张，PMI快报显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，由于全球对这个南亚国家的商品和服务需求有所改善，2 月份印度私营部门活动的增长速度为六个月来最快。【原文：India’s private sector activity increased at the fastest pace in six months in February, as global demand for the South Asian nation’s goods and services improved, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 乐观盈利提振情绪，中国科技股反弹
item.description: 周五，在香港交易的中国科技股指数跳涨逾 5%，原因是一系列乐观的财报提振了市场对该行业的乐观情绪。【原文：A gauge of Chinese technology shares traded in Hong Kong jumped more than 5% on Friday, as a slew of upbeat earnings boosted optimism toward the sector.】

item.title: 乌克兰妇女在战火中保持经济运转
item.description:
从煤矿到奶牛场，随着男性被征召入伍，女性开始从事艰苦的工作。【原文：

From coal mines to dairy farms, women have stepped into tough jobs as men have been called up.

】

item.title: 为什么避免投资与投资同样重要？
item.description:
在Merryn Talks Money节目中，Stray Reflections 的贾瓦德-米安（Jawad Mian）解释了为什么 60 和 70 年代的股市趋势应该为今天的您提供参考。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Stray Reflections’ Jawad Mian explains why stock market trends in the ‘60s and ‘70s should inform you today. 

】

item.title: 股票交易员指导您如何应对高风险的德国投票
item.description: 德国股市接近历史高点，联邦大选迫在眉睫，其影响将波及该国的小型股票以及国防和房地产等行业。【原文：A federal election is looming for a German equity market trading near all-time highs, and the impact is set to reverberate most across the country’s smaller stocks and sectors like defense and real estate.】

item.title: 特朗普对欧洲的言论自由攻击为科技大战埋下伏笔
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）政府正在利用言论自由作为对欧盟的最新攻击手段，这场运动正在动摇这个可追溯到冷战初期的联盟的基础。【原文：Donald Trump’s administration is using freedom of speech as the latest line of attack on the European Union in a campaign that’s shaking the foundations of an alliance that stretches back to the dawn of the Cold War.】

item.title: 马来西亚星巴克特许经营持有人因抵制活动损失三倍
item.description: Berjaya Food Bhd. 旗下星巴克在马来西亚的数百家分店导致该公司连续第五个季度出现亏损，而在此之前，该公司曾因美国支持以色列进攻加沙而抵制美国快餐品牌。【原文：Berjaya Food Bhd.’s hundreds of Starbucks’ subsidiary outlets across Malaysia contributed to the company’s fifth straight quarterly loss after boycotts of US fast food brands over America’s support of Israel’s offensive in Gaza began last year.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织呼吁泰国降息以支持通胀、减轻债务负担
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，进一步降低泰国的政策利率将有助于支撑低通胀，并减轻当地借款人的负担。【原文：A further reduction in Thailand’s policy interest rate will help shore up low inflation and ease the burden for local borrowers, according to the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: KKR 出售 Goodpack 据说将吸引 Apollo、Brookfield、I Squared 和 Stonepeak
item.description: 据熟悉这一过程的人士透露，KKR & Co.重新尝试出售集装箱和物流服务供应商 Goodpack 的可能性，吸引了包括阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.）、I Squared Capital 和 Stonepeak Partners 在内的全球投资公司的兴趣。【原文：KKR & Co.’s revived attempt to potentially sell container and logistics services provider Goodpack has attracted interest from global investment firms including Apollo Global Management Inc., I Squared Capital and Stonepeak Partners, according to people familiar with the process.】

item.title: 对冲基金为未来数月日元升值重仓期权交易
item.description: 在上周看涨日元的交易受到考验后，对冲基金再次打赌，未来几个月日元的表现将优于主要同类货币。【原文：After their bullish yen trades were tested last week, hedge funds have wagered again that the Japanese currency will outperform its major peers in coming months.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：共同基金击败外国投资者的最爱
item.description:
在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：

Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.

】

item.title: 贝莱德在美国证券交易委员会发布指导意见后恢复与公司谈判
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）在短暂暂停与公司的投资管理会议后，重新启动了与公司的投资管理会议，以评估美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）关于资产管理公司与公司会面时的影响力的新指导方针。【原文：BlackRock Inc. has restarted its investment stewardship meetings with companies after a short pause used to assess new Securities and Exchange Commission guidelines about the influence of asset managers when they meet with corporations.】

item.title: 特朗普钢铁关税威胁加剧亚洲金属供应过剩
item.description: 如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）继续对美国进口的所有金属征收全面关税，越南和印度等快速增长的亚洲钢铁生产国就有可能受到损害。【原文：Vietnam and India are among fast-growing Asian steel producers at risk of being hurt if President Donald Trump goes ahead with blanket tariffs on all US imports of the metal.】

item.title: 中国人民银行在现金紧张的情况下注入本月最多短期资金
item.description: 周五，中国央行加大了向金融系统注入短期资金的力度，试图缓解扰乱中国债券市场的资金紧张局面。【原文：China’s central bank increased injection of short-term funds into the financial system on Friday, in an attempt to ease a cash crunch that has roiled the nation’s bond market.】

item.title: 上田警告日本央行可介入平滑市场，日本收益率下跌
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示愿意干预债券市场以平息收益率飙升，并重申了央行支持稳定市场的长期承诺。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda signaled a readiness to intervene in the bond market to quell a surge in yields, reiterating the central bank’s long-standing commitment to supporting stable markets.】

item.title: 印尼将出售债券为普拉博沃的廉租房目标提供资金
item.description: 印度尼西亚计划出售政府债券，为低收入住房项目提供资金，中央银行同意在二级市场购买这些债券。【原文：Indonesia plans to sell government bonds to finance low-income housing projects, with the central bank agreeing to buy the debt in the secondary market.】

item.title: 台积电飙升，台湾考虑取消 ETF 权重上限
item.description: 台湾金融监管机构正在考虑取消单一股票在追踪指数的本地交易所交易基金市值中所占比例的上限。【原文：Taiwan’s financial regulator is considering lifting a cap that a single stock can take up in the market capitalization of local exchange-traded funds that track indexes.】

item.title: 巴西最高法院对 X 罚款，命令 Rumble 任命法律代表
item.description: 巴西最高法院法官亚历山大-德-莫赖斯（Alexandre de Moraes）对 X 公司处以新的罚款，同时命令另一家在美国起诉他的社交媒体公司在南美国家指定一名法律代表。【原文：Brazil Supreme Court Judge Alexandre de Moraes slapped X with a new fine while ordering another social media company that sued him in the US to appoint a legal representative in the South American nation.】

item.title: 新西兰央行欢迎奇异币走低成为振兴经济的催化剂
item.description: 新西兰央行对汇率走低表示欢迎，称这将有助于振兴今年的经济增长。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is welcoming a weaker exchange rate, saying it will help to revive economic growth this year.】

item.title: 日本加藤警告：债券收益率上升可能对财政造成压力
item.description: 在 10 年期基准收益率创下 15 年来的最高水平之后，日本财政部长警告说，国债收益率的上升可能会给日本本已紧张的财政带来压力。【原文：Rising government bond yields may strain Japan’s already tight finances, the nation’s finance minister warned, after the 10-year benchmark yield hit its highest level in 15 years.】

item.title: 避险需求强劲，黄金将实现第八周上涨
item.description: 由于地缘政治和贸易紧张局势以及对经济前景的担忧加剧了避险需求，黄金接近创纪录水平，并有望连续第八周上涨。【原文：Gold held near a record — on pace for an eighth straight weekly advance — on increasing haven demand fueled by geopolitical and trade tensions, as well as concerns about the economic outlook.】

item.title: GfK 称英国消费者比经济衰退后更加悲观
item.description: 与一年前英国经济刚刚走出低谷时相比，英国家庭对经济的看法更加悲观，这对英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）实现增长的希望是一个打击，工党在执政的头几个月里一直未能实现增长。【原文：British households are more gloomy about the economy than when the UK was emerging from a downturn a year ago, a blow to Chancellor Rachel Reeves’ hopes of delivering the growth that has eluded Labour in its first months in power.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前韩国早期出口萎靡不振
item.description: 本月迄今为止，韩国的出口势头有所减弱，使 2025 年的经济前景黯淡下来，政治动荡和唐纳德-特朗普关税计划的潜在影响为韩国经济蒙上了阴影。【原文：South Korea’s exports have lost momentum so far this month, dimming the 2025 outlook for an economy overshadowed by political turmoil and the potential impact of Donald Trump’s tariff plans.】

item.title: 日本通胀加速，令日本央行继续加息
item.description: 日本通胀加速超过预期，创下自 2023 年夏季以来的最快增速，使日本央行有望进一步上调基准利率。【原文：Japan’s inflation accelerated more than expected, rising at the fastest pace since the summer of 2023 and keeping the Bank of Japan on track to raise its benchmark interest rate further.】

item.title: 供应不确定性为石油前景蒙上阴影，石油将实现单周上涨
item.description: 由于供应不确定性增加，石油创下 1 月初以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：Oil headed for its biggest weekly gain since early January on increasing supply uncertainty.】

item.title: 特朗普首次对华贸易战如何催生新目标
item.description: 完整体验请访问特朗普首次对华贸易战如何催生新目标【原文：For the full experience visit: How Trump’s First Trade War With China Gave Rise to New Targets】
